member.name: T:Narumikazuchi.AlphanumericVersion
member.summary: Represents an immutable alphanumeric version number.

member.name: M:Narumikazuchi.AlphanumericVersion.op_Implicit(System.Version)~Narumikazuchi.AlphanumericVersion
member.summary: Implicit conversion from class.

member.name: M:Narumikazuchi.AlphanumericVersion.#ctor(Narumikazuchi.NotNullOrEmpty{System.String},Narumikazuchi.MaybeNullOrEmpty{System.String},Narumikazuchi.MaybeNullOrEmpty{System.String},Narumikazuchi.MaybeNullOrEmpty{System.String})
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the struct.

member.name: M:Narumikazuchi.AlphanumericVersion.ToString
member.summary: Transforms the into a according to the default format '#.#.#.#'.

member.name: M:Narumikazuchi.AlphanumericVersion.ToString(Narumikazuchi.MaybeNullOrEmpty{System.String})
member.summary: Formats the output to be in a user specified format.
member.param: The format in which to display the version. See the 'remarks'-section for more information.
member.remarks:
Remarks: When defining the format of the output use the following rules:
Use '#' as placeholder for any of the segments. The method will replace the first '#' with the major version, the second with the minor version, the third with the build version and the fourth with the revision. Every instance of that symbol afterwards will be ignored.
Every other character that is present in front, in between or after the '#' characters will be used as separators in the resulting output.
Example: A format of '#.#-#-#' will result in the output 'MAJOR.MINOR-BUILD-REVISION', while a format of 'a#bc#bc#d#e' will result in the output 'aMAJORbcMINORbcBUILDdREVISIONe', replacing each of the version segments with their respective values.
member.returns: This instance formatted as a

member.name: P:Narumikazuchi.AlphanumericVersion.Major
member.summary: Gets the major version component of this .

member.name: P:Narumikazuchi.AlphanumericVersion.Minor
member.summary: Gets the minor version component of this . Returns -1 if no minor version component is specified.

member.name: P:Narumikazuchi.AlphanumericVersion.Build
member.summary: Gets the build version component of this . Returns -1 if no build version component is specified.

member.name: P:Narumikazuchi.AlphanumericVersion.Revision
member.summary: Gets the revision version component of this . Returns -1 if no revision version component is specified.

member.name: M:Narumikazuchi.AlphanumericVersion.Clone
member.summary: Creates a new object that is an exact copy of this instance.
member.returns: A new object that is an exact copy of this instance.

member.name: T:Narumikazuchi.Collections.IStrongEnumerable`2
member.summary: Allows for the implementing object to optimize the generated IL code by providing a specific type instead of an interface for the method. Using this interface will reduce the delegation cost of virtual IL calls and therefore improve iteration times of -loops.

member.name: M:Narumikazuchi.Collections.IStrongEnumerable`2.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.
member.returns: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.

member.name: T:Narumikazuchi.Collections.IStrongEnumerator`1
member.summary: Allows for the implementing object to optimize the generated IL code by providing a specific type instead of an interface for the method. Using this interface will reduce the delegation cost of virtual IL calls and therefore improve iteration times of -loops. This interface also removes the requirement of the implementation of the method, making the resulting type even more memory efficient.
